meanings.definition: Not capable of being changed or modified.
meanings.sent1: The rules of the game are unalterable once the match begins.
meanings.sent2: Her unalterable decision to move to a new city surprised her friends.
meanings.sent3: The unalterable fact that cats always land on their feet never fails to amuse me.
meanings.sent4: His unalterable loyalty to his friends is like a rock in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The unalterable truth that water freezes at 0 degrees Celsius is a fundamental scientific principle.

meanings.definition: Remaining the same and unable to be altered.
meanings.sent1: The unalterable landscape of the desert stretches endlessly in all directions.
meanings.sent2: Despite the storm, the old lighthouse stood unalterable on the rocky cliff.
meanings.sent3: The unalterable color of his favorite shirt always makes his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unalterable smile brightened even the darkest days.
meanings.sent5: The unalterable melody of the song echoed through the empty hallways.
